body: I love this app, it has a lot of really helpul information without having to browse on internet or books or any other source. It comes with several cute features so you can feel it is made specially for you, like pics of your belly, charts for yourself, reminders, etc.

title: Really useful app!!
body: I just love this! I've used it everyday since I found out I was pregnant!! I'm currently 16 weeks today and love reading the different blogs tailored more towards my current week. The only down side to this app is that you have to pay for it after week 14. Since I used it everyday I went ahead and purchased it. :)

title: Good app!
body: I like this app. I think the blogs are really helpful as you get to see what to expect for each week of development. Even though this is my 8th baby, it is still fun to look and see "You are ____ weeks pregnant today" when I sign into the app. It's nice to be reminded exactly if my gestation at each sign in. I also like the still shots of baby in womb. It's very informational and causes you to make sure to take care of YOU during your pregnancy :)!

title: I love everything about this app!
body: I'm on my fourth right now and I love how perfect this app is for new moms and experienced moms alike. I even learned a few things I didn't know with this. It's easy to figure out, very informative, and very visually engaging. The ONLY thing I wish it included was quickening and lightening on the timeline. Other than that, it's absolutely perfect! :)

title: Uninstalled
body: Started using this app when I found out I was pregnant. I'm now 15wks and last wk (my 14th wk) the app stopped working. I contacted someone by email to only be told that the app stops working on lite version at 13wks (not stated in the description btw), so disappointing app! Unless you dnt mind paying for it after the "trial period" as I'm calling it, dnt even bother installing. There's plenty more good quality pregnancy apps out there that offer the same services (baby's development and your body changes) FOR FREE! I'm actually loving one right now, that I started using just yesterday.

title: Worth paying for upgrade
body: A lot of reviews are unhappy that there is a payment required to use it passed 15 weeks but it well worth the couple bucks. This is the best pregnancy app with SO much information and tools to help track the pregnancy. I would recommend this app over any of the other pregnancy apps.

title: Have to pay at 15 weeks! Not happy.
body: Had this app from very early pregnancy (found out at 3 weeks) and loved it, until we got to 15 weeks and found out we had to pay to keep using it - nowhere does it ever say you have to pay until you have a chance to fall in love with it and then have to pay. Granted, it's only $4, but I would rather have another app for free than pay that. Ovia is totally free, and cuter than this one - I recommend that one if you don't want to pay either!

title: Absolutely LOVE this app !
body: I used this app throughout my whole pregnancy & I absolutely loved it . It was very helpful & kept me updated each day .

title: Great program
body: I just love it. It's easy and very helpful. My wife is in 7 week pregnancy and we love to start the welcome page with the name and how long she is pregnant. I just wish you can add little more about problems in pregnancy because we all knows that lot of future mothers have it in the journey of motherhood . Thank you for good work.

title: Suggestion
body: I love this app. It has everything you need for your pregnancy in one place. I'd like to make a suggestion though.. It'd be nice to have a daily water intake tracker to monitor the amount of water you're drinking every day. Just a thought. I know there are other apps for this, but the recommended amount for pregnant women is different.

title: Dishonest
body: This app is marketed as a pregnancy app when it should be  advertised at the first 14 weeks app because literally everything on the app becomes completely unavailable after that. And even during those short few weeks, there are many functions of the app that are unavailable to non-paying users. I didn't find anything original and/or different about this app compared to the HONESTLY a free ones that would make me want to pay $4 for it. It's absolutely ridiculous. Wish I didn't waste my time downloading it.

title: AWSOME APP!!!!
body: This app was exactly what I was looking for when I found out I was pregnant. It not only has a timeline for everything the Dr does but also shows me what I can expect my baby to look like week by week. It has a lot of other great features too many to list but it is worth the download I look at mine every day ‚ù§Ô∏è

title: Nice design, but typical app, with a price tag
body: I like the fluid design, but that's the only thing that separates it from the other FREE apps.

title: Great for first pregnancy
body: I am pregnant with twins first time and it's a great app for learning about your body and how it's change you most importantly you can actually see how your baby may look like have been using it and loving it so far I am 36 week pregnant with twin girls almost there counting the days even for me which is plus

title: I Recommend for u all
body: I loved it but we need to add arabic language to get some more information or at least we want to copy the daly info page so we can translate it by any translator because there's no option to copy the daily info page.

title: Amazing Prego App!
body: I have used this app with two pregnancies and have found it very helpful. I am a very visual person so I found the images of the baby's growth very helpful. The app offers a daily blog, tips, baby name guide, and week by week guidelines to the pregnancy journey. They even accommodate for women carrying multiple babies. I highly recommend this app!

title: Love!
body: I love this app! I get up every morning just to see what new information is waiting on me. This is my 4th pregnancy but it has been very different from my other 3. A lot of helpful information for me that I didn't know with my others, since I didn't have the same symptoms with all of my pregnancies!

title: LOVE love love this app!
body: Out of all the pregnancy apps, this one is definitely my favorite so far, and has made my first pregnancy a lot of fun! There is a lot of interesting and fun info everyday, and the weekly pictures are awesome quality. I love being surprised every new week when it changes to a new one. Definitely recommend :)

title: Great App for the father also
body: This was a great pregnancy app for fathers to be as well. This app provided me with great information each day. This information allowed me to know what my wife was going through, what she needed and how I could assist. This app also allowed me to know how my baby was developing each day. Great pictures and supportive articles.

title: Helpful info
body: I loved this app ! This was a very helpful resource for the last 9 months. I would look forward to reading the daily progress of my little one. You are always curious about what's developing this week, and what your baby looks like this month. This app shows you everything !

title: Great app
body: As this being my first pregnancy, I am very pleased with this app. It is informative, day to day with blogs about questions you may have. Week to week baby updates. It has images of ultrasounds (2D and 3D) so you can see what your baby possibly looks like. It has a lot of other features. I recommend it!

title: Best pregnancy app
body: I have been using this app from the moment I found out I was pregnancy and compare to other apps this one has been on point week to week....I check this app literally every morning...it helped me a whole lot especially being a first time mom. I highly recommend this app

title: Best pregnancy app
body: This is the best pregnancy app I have found. From great info to the weekly size and pics of baby and write weekly journals. You can add doc appointments and write down your weight, blood pressure and such and see graphs of your weight change. I'm almost 20 weeks and this is my go to for the most helpful info!

title: Loved this app
body: It's a great app, it had everything I needed on it. I loved giving my husband updates of our babies weight, length, and development. It was also nice to have a place to store all my pregnancy stuff. Appointments, Dr. Info, names I liked, to do list and much more. I've loved it and it was worth a few bucks to have it.

title: Very informative and easy to use!
body: I really like this app, I have the premium version and it has great information with a daily blog on pretty much anything you need to know about your pregnancy. You can add photos each month of your own growing belly. I have almost 2 months left of my pregnancy and this app has made it fun and informative to track it. Thank you!

title: Best app!
body: Definitely the best pregnancy app there is and well worth the money. It's personalized and gives you a new thing to read daily about your pregnancy. If you don't have this app I would recommend getting it. They do have a free trial version, but it only goes so far and your limited on what you can do in the app.

title: Only free up to 14 weeks
body: I have been using this app for 16 weeks and just realized it only allows me to see weekly baby images until week 14. The rest are for paid members. I find this very sneaky that this was hidden until now. I might have paid for it if they mentioned it in the beginning. The app itself isn't that great to worth paying for. There are other pregnancy apps with better information than this one. Also, the movement and animation at the top is very annoying. Should only animate once when the app first loads.

title: I love this app!
body: I didn't have any pregnancy apps with my daughter, who is almost three. I have a couple for my son, but this is my favorite by far! I love all of the information it gives, and seeing the development of my son. I'm 34 weeks, so I paid for the upgrade, but I'm so glad I did! I definitely recommend this app.

title: Cool little app.
body: It's very cute and also helpful on the topic of what in the world to think about or things to ask your doctor or just look up yourself on line. Also, kind of a cool thing to see what you'd be dealing with even of you aren't pregnant yet.

title: Great informational app!
body: This is my first pregnancy and this app has worked wonders! Once I get through my first trimester I will be sure to buy the app but the free one is by far the greatest one I've used! I love all the great features like the checklist and all the informational tabs especially on nutrition and excersizing! I recommend it to any mother and father to be!

title: A must have!
body: If you are pregnant, you need this app! It tells you everything from week one to full term. Gives you daily tips and you get to see what your baby is doing every week with a picture on how it looks. So awesome and so useful! I highly recommend this app to any one that is pregnant.

title: Worth paying for.
body: I was caught off guard when the 15 week point came around and I realized you have to purchase the full app to continue using it. I was hesitant at first but love the layout of the app and all of the information it provides. By far the best pregnancy app I've used and I was happy to pay for it.

title: Worth It.
body: It does ask you to pay for the app after a certain point, but I still highly recommended it. I loved it all the way through my first pregnancy, and I plan to use it in the future as well. It has absolutely everything you need for planning.

title: No info after 15 weeks
body: I have several pregnancy apps and enjoy checking them all weekly for the updates. But this app stops giving you any information at 15 weeks, asking instead that you buy the paid version. Their app is not special or interesting enough for me to want to pay for information I can get for free literally all over the Internet and via other apps. I will be deleting this one. I highly recommend Ovia if you're looking for an informative, modern app with a gorgeous interface.

title: Support multiple kids
body: Please support Multiple babies. They may not at the same time. But I do want to keep my old baby's info.

title: Love the app
body: I've really enjoyed this app and found it very easy and straight forward to use. I like the interface face and the information offered in the app more than the others I tried. I tried about 4 different apps for the first couple weeks and this one was my favorite.

title: Used to love it...
body: I was somehow happy with this app when I first got it. I understand app developers need to make money by making you buy upgrades or pay full for the app. It's not about how much the upgrade is but the fact that says "free" and then at 15 weeks you have to buy the app so you can continue to use it. If I wanted to pay for an app I wouldn't have get a free app from the beginning. Very disappointed, looking for a new app right after I delete this one.

title: Good app
body: This app is informative and something fun to look forward to reading every day.  The information is accurate and easy to understand.  Everything may not apply to you but you are filled with information and don't need to spend time looking elsewhere.
response: It's lovely to read such a great review! Thanks!

title: The BEST!!
body: There is not ONE THING I wish this app had. It honestly provides you with THE MOST information. From daily tips and info to weekly articles and pictures of what the baby should look like. And it even includes notes for your partner! Definitely worth the download AND the purchase!

title: Love it
body: I just love this app. I have two more apps, but this one is the best. Almost everyday I go to check the blogs and the weekly information for baby growth. I love how I can see an example of how the baby is looking so far is very clear and so real looking. and the 2D and 3D images. This app is just amazing. Is worth buying it!!!

title: Love this app!
body: It has everything you need and the pictures look amazing I love the timeline feature so I can see what the baby looks like and how many weeks and months and what I should be preparing for it's awesome I hope they don't change it it's the only one that doesn't look tacky ‚ù§Ô∏è

title: My favorite pregnancy app!
body: I love this app ! It is hands down , the best pregnancy app that I have found so far . I love reading the blog posts for every day and I get excited each week to see what my baby looks like today ! I am not usually one to pay for apps but I recommend buying the full version . It's awesome ! :)

title: Great for the kids
body: I am expecting my 6th baby. I got this app mostly to show my kids what the baby looks like inside of me and how she's growing. The graphics are wonderful and are just what I needed. I am sure I could accomplish the same thing with a Google search every week, but the convenience was with the $4.

title: Love..Love..Love this App!
body: I am not 36weeks pregnant now, but have used this app since I found out I was pregnant around 7weeks and it's an awesome app. I would definitely recommend it! I love how you can see how the baby looks each week and all the information the app gives you about each week! Love this app to the fullest!  ‚ù§Ô∏è

title: Pretty useful !!!! Worth paying for.!!!!
body: I really like this app. It helps out a lot with questions that I forget to ask at my doctor visits and the 3D , 4D ultrasound images are awesome.  I'm not going to complain about paying for the full app. Bc it's useful and worth it. People should stop complaining and stop expecting everything to be free. Oh well if it's not free it ain't!!!! Get over it.

title: Great App
body: This app gives great key points to look out for throughout your pregnancy. Even though a lot of the things mentioned didn't happen to me, I still like that it gives you a heads up on what to possibly expect, with a little guidance. Also, it was on par with my expected due date.

title: Very good but missing key features
body: I love the layout and all the features of this app I like the shoes ping lists and docs appointments. I just wish it had a journal or some place where I could record symptoms or things that I was feeling. Also you should have the option to take belly pics every week!! But other than that it's great.

title: App is Deceiving - not free
body: I downloaded this app as it appeared to have detailed content and I enjoyed the images of the weekly fetus. However, this app's advertising is misleading. It is not free as you will need to pay $3.99 to access any content post 14 weeks. Had the app been up front about the cost I likely would have paid. However, I do not enjoy being coerced into the payment and will be switching apps. I wish I had just downloaded a different app from the start in order to prevent the need to re-enter all data.

title: Great App
body: I completely understand why the don't make you pay until 13weeks. Since once you hit that point your chance of miscarriage is far less likely. I am 11 weeks now and will definitely be getting the full version when the time comes :)

title: KelseyK!
body: I enjoy this app but the spelling and grammar made me question purchasing the full version. Once I did purchase the full version, it changed my due date, the photos of myself and partner, erased my list of names, & all of the doctors appointments that I entered. After purchasing the full version I basically had to start brand new & I was not happy about it.

user_name: Mother of 4 with #5 on the way
title: Fruit of the week
body: This app was so wonderful in allowing our four children to understand what stage of development and more specifically what size the baby is!  We have a designated fruit of the week depending upon what fruit the baby is the size of. The kids loved it and seem to relate so much better!

title: The best pregnancy app
body: I love this pregnancy app the best so far. It has not only weekly updates about your growing baby, but also daily. It also has weight tracker. The only 2 additional things I wish it had are: days count till labor (i.e. "You  are 236 days to go") and body measurements (waist and breasts size change).

title: Love love love!
body: This is my favorite pregnancy app that I have. It was worth the monetary upgrade to follow my little ones growth. It has day by day as well as weekly updates and advice according to where you are in your pregnancy. It also has pictures (belly, 2D, 3D, and sketch) of what baby looks like at different points of development.

title: Best!
body: This is one of the best apps, if not the best, I could possibly find for the baby and myself. Everything is crystal clear, and i never have to worry about a symptom im having, because they help you every step of the way.

title: Wonderful App
body: I have used this app my entire pregnancy and LOVE IT! It provides so much information in such a clean and easy to navigate forum. I love the moving imagery and pictures of belly and scans to show what things are probably looking like inside. The weight tracker has been great for me, as I have had to carefully monitor my gains.

title: Fantastic app
body: My husband and I really enjoy getting to see what our baby looks similar to week to week and also to read up on weekly development posts :). Fantastic app - track your weight while seeing what your baby is projected to weigh, and his or her length week to week.

title: Love this app! Best pregnancy app in the market.
body: This app has helped me from the beginning. So much information and even helped me ask the right questions for my doctor. I loved how it helped me keep track of baby size and weight. And it is so worth the money for the full app. Buy it. You will love it.

title: I like it.
body: This app has been way more informative than the free apps that I also sometimes use along with this one, plus easy to use so I didn't mind paying for the full version. The pictures are realistic so it's neat to see what the progress of the baby really looks like.

title: Great App
body: It's a great app. Not only user friendly but kid friendly.  My two older kids like getting information on what the baby is doing and looking like and this app I feel is appropriate for them to use.  I just wish it didn't make you pay for the last two trimesters .... Oh well.

title: My personal experience
body: I downloaded the app based on the good reviews it had. I enjoyed it's weekly blogs, that was until I turn 15 weeks. The day I turn 15 weeks I tried to open it's pictures, blogs or any other icon and a advertisement will pop suggesting I purchased the $3 app. After I would x the add, the icon I had clicked on will only provide me with 14weeks info. I reset the app twice. I waited 2 weeks to see if maybe it was a mistake. I end up deleting the app.

title: Great go to app for any expecting mom or dad
body: I have been using this app since I got pregnant...I honestly love it and love the links they offer. HOWEVER, I didn't like that I had to pay $3.99 after a few months, but I did anyways. A lot like what to expect when you're expecting, except that one is free.

title: My go-to app!
body: I love this app. It is updated daily with new information, and my 3 year old even enjoys logging on with me every day to see "what baby brother looks like right now." I love the blogs and a lot of the information pertains to me and my pregnancy journey. I would highly recommend this app to new and seasoned moms. :)

title: Wonderful
body: I've used this app up until the day I delivered. It was very helpful with plenty of daily and weekly information, along with giving the size and an animation of the baby. Definitely made it easier for my husband who was deployed the first few months of it. :)

title: Best pregnancy app hand down!!
body: I have purchased around five baby apps. The only one I continually use is this app. Daily I have something to read and learn from. My wife is 38 weeks pregnant now and it seems like this app helped walk me through the entire pregnancy. Definitely worth the money!!

title: Love it!
body: I downloaded a bunch of apps as soon as I find out I was pregnant ...so far this is the only one I kept on my phone! Really helpful specially to have your partner involved, my fianc√© would ask me every week to show him the image of how the baby look:) it was an amazing app for our first pregnancy

title: Not actually free
body: This app was free with my first pregnancy, but now it requires you to upgrade and pay after 14weeks. The weekly updates are nice,but could be better. A significant portion of each week's information is for people with multiples. This is wasted on the average mom-to-be. Surely this app could ask for this information and include it for those that want it while omitting for those that do not.

title: Easy to use
body: I have downloaded a few pregnancy apps a d this by far is my favorite. It's very easy to navigate and has helpful blogs and articles for where you are in your pregnancy. I also love that you can track your belly size as the months go on and the timeline.

title: Great App
body: I like the daily articles and blogs. The timelines and various baby pictures are fun too. I'm at week 24 and I haven't been crazy about the baby to fruit comparison being the same to a couple of weeks! Maybe update that portion! Otherwise I've been happy with the app.
response: Awesome review! Thanks for the feedback about the fruit size comparisons! We‚Äôre happy to hear you like the App so much, though.

title: Love love love!!!
body: I am a first time mom and this by far is the best app out there for expecting mothers. I actually bought a couple and ended up deleting all the others, they just couldn't compare! I especially love how it has little tidbits for the father as well. It's nice so my husband feels involved and informed too. Great app!

title: Love, love, love!!
body: This is officially my number one pregnancy app. I love the timeline!! It's easy to see and read, plus it's so educational! The shopping list lets me choose what I have, need to buy, and don't want. Haven't found any flaws yet!! I wish id had this on my first pregnancy but it's still great for my second.

title: Love it!
body: I've been using this app since week 4 and have used it everyday. The only down fall is that when I had to switch to a new phone I lost my belly photos and for the last 3 days the daily blog has been stuck on the same thing but when you go to open it, it says page not found.

title: Great app until week 14
body: I loved this app from the minute I downloaded it. They have great information for you to learn. However after day 98 I was not able to see any Information even though they showed me what day I was on and what I should be reading. This app is trail base and nowhere in the description does it say that. It's $3.99 which is not a lot but just mentioning it in the beginning would have been a lot better.. Great app just disappointed üòí

title: It's very informative
body: I love the information and the illustrations. If you read through the whole app you see that at some point you need to pay for it to get access to the second and third trimester information. I will gladly pay for it.

title: Fun, informative
body: Great app and I was happy to pay for it. It was fun for us to look at the new info each week and watch the size comparisons change. Only complaint is some of the weekly info seemed a little sexist... The "partners" section in the weekly part talked a lot about how to plan finances etc. moms can be the breadwinners of the family too!

title: Loveeee
body: I love this app. It really gave me a unique look at how my baby was growing inside of me. Not only by fruit but the ways it could look like on an ultrasound to how your body would be changing. It have great tips and articles. I definitely recommend this app and will use it for future pregnancies

title: Helpful and supportive
body: My pregnancy came as a surprise. This app has given me all the tools I need to live my days confidently and healthy throughout every trimester. Great info for partners, too. Easy interface and insightful, beautiful images to gauge what my little guy is looking like week by week. Thank you!!

title: Love it!!
body: I love this app! I used it with both of my pregnancies and loved following the weekly updates on what's happening with baby and my body as well as the daily blogs! The weekly images are beautiful and the layout is super easy to follow and use! I definitely recommend this one!

title: Excellent Info; Could Be More Inclusive
body: The information provided is great, and I love the video and images of fetal development. However, it would be wonderful to see language that is inclusive of all family types. Using the word "partner" in place of "dad" or "husband" would be a simple way to acknowledge and include non-married heterosexual couples as well as lesbian couples and surrogates.

title: Great app. Very useful. Weeks aren't ahead
body: Love this app! For those that complain its a week ahead, I believe it's not. I am technically nine weeks, but really I've completed nine weeks, six days an I'm technically in my tenth week. When I hit ten weeks tomorrow that's because I've completed ten weeks but ill be in my eleventh. Right?

title: Pregnancy App
body: This was my go to guide for keeping track of the week to week stages of development during my pregnancy. It was a very helpful application for not only weekly and daily information, but for creating a birth plan and shopping list too. I highly recommend this app!

title: Must download this app!!!
body: I loved the weekly updates and the daily tips/info. Loved the weekly pictures! Also loved tracking my weight, doctors appointments, blood pressure, and pretty much everything about this app. It also will post to your Facebook weekly how far along you are.

title: best pregnancy ap!!!
body: I downloaded quite a few pregnancy aps and this is by far the best! It is easy to follow, keeps me interested and worth the few dollars it costs for the paid version! I look forward to each week and seeing my pregnancy progress through this ap!

title: Deleting it due to premium requests!!
body: When I first downloaded this app, I loved it. It was by far my favorite pregnancy app. Now I'm deleting it because if it tells me to upgrade to the premium version one more time I'm going to scream! Almost every single button I click takes me to that screen and I have to back up and try my request again. In the 45 seconds I've been using the app tonight, it's taken me to the premium app suggestion 7 times. If I wanted to upgrade, I would. But I DON'T! I'm done. Deleting.

title: Adorable.
body: Nevermind the haters of this app. Those people have nothing better to do except judge. The app does what it is supposed to and I used it to follow my Sister in Law's pregnancy and now my own. If you find anything unsatisfactory then use Google for more resources! The app never forced anyone to use JUST it anyway. Get a life haters.

title: Best pregnancy app!!!!
body: I LOVE this app! As a first time mom, I had no clue about anything and this was just so helpful! And I loved all the precious weekly baby images and the daily articles. It's the first thing I do in the morning. I have 5 different baby apps and this one is by far the best one!

title: Love this app
body: Love how the app gives me updates weekly and daily. Love following along my baby's growth.

title: THE BEST APP EVER!
body: I am two months pregnant today and I am so happy I have had this app since the second I found out I was expecting!! The day by day week by week information is awesome and watching your baby grow is amazing!!! Love love love just bought the premium version for the rest of my pregnancy !

title: Awesome!
body: This is my fourth pregnancy and the first time using this app. I wish I had it for the other pregnancies!  It is so helpful with the weight tracking, the daily blogs, the updates on the baby, and many other features. I would highly recommend!
response: It's lovely to read such a nice review - thanks!

title: Great App
body: It's a great app to help you get through your first trimester. Gives you many baby names, what you would need in your hospital bag, etc. I'm a first time mom with 10 weeks left & it was very helpful due to the fact I was clueless on mostly everything. Thanks to this app I gained some knowledge.

title: Absolutely LOVE this app!
body: This app is a MUST if you're expecting! I downloaded this app along with three other popular ones & ended up deleting the others & purchasing this one! My husband & I love reading the week by week descriptions & the pictures are absolutely beautiful.

title: Loved it!!
body: I loved this app very much. I have been using it since early conception and have five weeks left till baby comes. I loved the pictures, weekly info and trackers. I used this app to keep my friends and family in the loop about the growth of my baby, thanks to its FB options.

title: Love it!
body: I was trying to find the perfect app especially since I'm a first timer and this is amazing!

title: Great! But...
body: I love this app! It has a beautiful UI, but it really needs a place for a daily journal. It would also be cool if it had some kind of "daily survey" where you can check off some of your symptoms (some could be funny) and wrote notes /take pics. But I do really like the app. It gives great tips and I love the appointment and to do list.

title: Hate having to upgrade !!
body: It was a great app and I looked and heckled it everyday in my pregnancy until week 14 and then I got cut off unexpectedly because I had to pay for the rest of my weeks of pregnancy. Absolute crap !! What a serious rip off. You should make the Pro version like other period tracker apps that you can upgrade with cooler things as an incentive, not to track your 3/4 of pregnancy. Very upsetting. It honestly was the best pregnancy app that looked the best and had the best pictures and information. Pretty sad.

title: Great app!
body: I have used this app for both of my pregnancies. It was as reliable and informative the second time as it was the first. Love the baby timeline, the daily and weekly write-ups and my ability to track data and build all kinds of to-do lists.

title: Email
body: My husband actually found this app and recommended it. I logged in several times but it kept stating that my email is invalid. I've been using the same email for over 12 years. I don't see how it should be invalid for one app. Great app though! üëç

title: Love!!! The best pregnancy app!
body: This is the best pregnancy app! I had it when I was pregnant with twin girls and it has everything and the contraction timer was used many times as I had to stop and slow down contractions before my due date. It was the first thing I downloaded for my pregnancy.

title: Loved this app
body: This was the very first app I downloaded and I loved it. Used it all of my first trimester until it said I had to pay for the full version. It's not that I don't think the app is worth it, but their are too many free pregnancy apps that are decent to go and pay for one.

title: Pregnancy app
body: Love it!! Think it's only good for the first trimester and an upgrade is necessary for the second and third...but definitely considering buying it (hate to buy apps). Love that the updates are daily..most are only week to week. Don't know what I would do without this :)

title: cool app
body: awesome app. this is my first pregnancy and it helps me a lot to see what my baby is like and how he's changing every week. I just wish there was an app that tells you different changes the baby goes through everyday not every week cause I'm not a patient person, haha.

title: Good basic app
body: This is a useful app for the basic pregnancy info.  And some useful info through out the calendar and free areas.  I definitely liked the week, day, & trimester count it has.  The unfortunate part for me, as this is my third, the info I was needing refreshed on I had to pay for!  So I looked into another pregnancy app that was completely free and got the refresher info or places to look for it on the app.

title: Love it!
body: I'm very happy with this app. It keeps me on track with my pregnancy. I love how detailed it is. Seeing what our baby looks like week by week is such an amazing feeling and so worth the wait. Plus it pinpointed when my estimated delivery date, If your expecting then I highly recommend this app! <3 <3<3

title: Useful, but....
body: The app is super useful, but the push notifications are incorrect - when I complete 12 weeks as per the app (which is correct), I get a push notification telling me I've completed 13 weeks.  I would recommend turning off push notifications until this is fixed.

title: 5 stars!
body: I'm pregnant for the first time and I live in a different state than all of my family and friends. So this app has definitely helped me with a ton of questions that I need answers to. I love that it gives you tips and hints too. And it's quite accurate! Bottom line 5 stars!

title: I love this app!
body: This app is so much better than other ones I've had. It gives you daily tips, weekly baby and me updates and most importantly lets me check out pictures of what the baby might look at a certain week. I just love this app!

title: Great First Baby App
body: My husband and I would read this app together and it taught us so much on how our baby progressed in the womb. It also prepared me for what to expect at each appointment. I was able to ask informative questions and this app helped me to understand the doctors answers.

title: Great app!
body: I'm glad I chose this app to guide me through my first pregnancy. I still remember how excited I got when I first saw at the top "you are 6 weeks pregnant"! It's been very informative and helpful. I just wish the part where you upload your werkly/monthly belly pics would be easier to use. Other than that, awesome app!

title: Full version
body: I used this app with my daughter and loved learning something new everyday. So when I became pregnant again I was excited to scroll through all the images, in anticipation, and learnedI have to buy it again! I already purchased it once and never deleted the app so I'm not very happy about not being able to 'restore' my full version. Same thing happened to a friend of mine. I think I'll find a new app.

title: Good Information
body: I'm using this app with my second pregnancy. I did not have an app with the first. The most useful thing, for me, has been the week by week pictures and info about the baby and about my own changes. Is this the best app ever? Hardly. But it is a useful tool and if you don't mind the price tag, I'd say go for it.

title: Very informative!
body: Didn't know I had to buy app at the end of my first trimester and I have decided whether I will or not since I'm using 3 others that work well too. But I very much enjoy this app, I read it every morning. Wish it was around with my first child.

title: Serious glitch!
body: I was extremely happy with this app and thought the info included was better than any other pregnancy app I was using.  That was until day 91 when it stopped advancing.  It has kept track of my progress on the initial page but the daily and weekly updates do not go past day 91.  I have deleted and reinstalled the app four times in an effort to get it to work properly again and nothing has worked.  Overall, a very disappointing experience.

title: Love this App
body: I've been using this app for most of my pregnancy and it's been wonderful!! Lots of detailed information daily and a weekly update on how the baby is growing gives you something to look forward to.  I highly recommend buying this app!!!

title: The Pregnancy App
body: ~ filled with tons of advice and things you need to know from blogs. Facts about changes your baby & your body is going through and tips for your partner, too. I'm just annoyed that they only let you see these tips up to week 13, then you have to buy the app. I still believe this is worth it.

title: Love this app, love that is has a twin option!!
body: I'm a mother of two, & expecting twins, I love this app. I downloaded about 4-5 pregnancy apps, & have deleted all but two of them, this one being one I kept. Love that is has a twin option, not many apps has info about twin pregnancy. Great app for sure!!

title: Best app for moms to be
body: This app has everything. Appointment reminders, weekly baby info, kick count, baby name, time line and so much more. I'm really glad I got this app specially being able to see how my baby looks at she develops and having a glimps at the ultrasound pictures 2D band 3D. Worth the money.

title: Wow, I'm impressed
body: Even though I'm a student midwife, this app lends insight to what prepare for and think about week by week that I wasn't even aware of!  This is my first pregnancy, so it is a lot different than just advising women...  I am very grateful for this app and will probably be buying the full version!

title: Love it
body: It only shows you up to 14 weeks I think, then it asks you to pay. I thought at the time and still think that it was worth it. So many things to read about and answers questions that I've forgotten to ask my mid. Love it.

title: Great App for Pregnancy
body: I really enjoy all the articles and blogs this app provides as well as the detailed pictures and even info on twin/multiple pregnancies. We are pregnant with #5 and this by far has been our favorite app. The couple dollars is more than worth it. üëçüèº‚ù§Ô∏è

title: Good
body: Pretty good app. Informative and has lots of other things to look at and read. Not just the typical "this is what's happening to baby this week."  Only reason I have it 4 stars is in the lite version theres things you cant use and after after week  14 you have to buy the app. worth the download tho.

title: I love this app!
body: Wonderful features and never have any issues! I look forward to reading about the growth of my baby and also enjoy reading about what's happening to my body! Wish I would have had this app with my first two babies!

title: Love it!
body: I used this app along with two others during my pregnancy, and I always opened this one first. I love the pictures, articles, and blog posts they give daily. I always recommend this to my friends when they're expecting!

title: Best around
body: A year ago we could not share the app between devices (phone, pad) once purchased. This has since been fixed (üëèüèª). After trying out a couple of free apps, it became clear this one was worth buying. It's the best around, even though some of the daily blog articles are just "meeeeh".

title: Great app for first time parents
body: This is a great companion app for a first time pregnancy. Well worth the money. Synced my data between both my phone and my iPad. Gave me (dad) lots of good information, and a place to keep track of everything. Paid version highly recommended.

title: App stops at 15 weeks
body: One of the main reasons as to why I chose this app out of all of the other ones was because of all of the detailed pictures of the babies it has. I was absolutely devastated when there were no more pictures after week 14. I'm short on money and will not pay for the other half of this app, but as an expecting mother, I would appreciate if you could make this app free for people who are really interested in the growth of their children.

title: Love this App! <3
body: This app is so helpful! I feel like I am better prepared for my pregnancy. All the features are helping me keep track of everything my baby needs and myself. I am organized with appointments and so much more! I would highly recommend this app!

title: Perfect for us Preggos!!!üòäüòä
body: This app is beyond amazing. When I first found out I was expecting, I found this App. I am now 27weeks and 3 days pregnant. This gives me updates everyday. It's very informative and I absolutely love their 2D and 3D images. Also their estimate of the baby's possible weight. Yessssssss!!!!!!üëçüèæüëçüèæüëçüèæüëçüèæüëçüèæüëçüèæ

title: First time mom and my husband and I are so excited to see our little boy
body: This app is amazing this is the best one. I get everything about my baby week by week and about me also how to eat how to take care off me and my baby also. I love this app to much

title: Great app!
body: I've used this with all 3! Of my pregnancies the pro upgrade stays no matter if you delete the app or get a new phone. It is my absolute favorite pregnancy app. It's got everything I needed to help make my pregnancies, births, and the time after birth successful. I highly recommend!
response: It‚Äôs really nice to receive such lovely feedback.  Thank you so much! We‚Äôre working hard to make the best pregnancy App.

title: Best app
body: This is a great app!! I have another pregnancy one but this one is

title: Fun to use
body: What I like the best are the realistic photos of the growth development week by week. If I decide to purchase the extended version it would primarily be because of that.

title: Information at your belly button
body: I like this app a lot. This is not my first pregnancy, but this app has helped me deal with symptoms I didn't have while pregnant with my other 4 children. I love keeping track of my trimesters and what's going in and this app helps me do that. Thanks.

title: Awesome!!
body: This app is absolutely amazing especially after I upgraded for 2.99 which I think is totally worth it! They didn't leave out any details and it has every possible thing you need to know and amazing pictures. Great app, 100% worth it!!

title: Great pregnancy app
body: Love the week by week description and its so easy to email out to my husband or mother my babies weekly progress. I also really enjoy the baby size guide that compares the size of baby to a fruit or vegetable. So glad I found this app. Definitely recommend.

title: Only Good For 14 Weeksüë∂üò¢
body: This app has some very cool features but unless you plan on paying for the full version you won't be able to use it past 14 weeks of pregnancy which is not specified before you download the app. I have other apps that I like more and can use thru out my entire pregnancy! This will get deleted at 14 weeks, sorry not sorry üòíüò†üòë

title: GREAT, but...
body: This app is great! Loved it. This is my first baby, ((currently 17weeks)) so it was helpful, as well as comforting. Detailed, neat seeing the week by week photos. However, will only show up to week 15 it seems like before you have to purchase the upgrade. So I've switched to a different app BUT it isn't nearly as good as this one! #sadpanda

title: Lovely app
body: My wife and I both used this app to track her pregnancy.  Very interactive providing up to date info applicable to your individual due date. We both could track together, read articles separately and discuss.  Thanks for a great product!

title: Best Pregnancy App!
body: Great app with a ton of information, tips, tricks, etc. that is updated daily. I like the many features: weight tracker, kick counter, the ability to add my own notes and pictures, the list goes on! Get this app and you will not be disappointed.

title: Great app!!!
body: This app has been great!!! Every Sunday morning it's a new week for me so my husband and I lay in bed in the morning and read all the new info together. It really helps him understand more. Also the day to day tips are great!! I love the pix and the day tracker, and appointment tracker. Super helpful!

title: A cheery and friendly feeling app
body: A feature-packed app that tracks your pregnancy day by day, info and facts about your growing baby and your  symptoms and health. With a place for your lists and appointments and ability to be personalized for dads, grandparents and other family members.

title: Great app
body: Love the app-hate that I had to pay for it on iPhone then again on iPad and charged a 3rd time when I tried to get the new update this week. Also update asks every single time I turn it on if I want to connect with FB and twitter. Needs an option to never register with other apps. Very annoying. Other than that I love the great images and info.

title: Refun or fix the app
body: I have been using this app for almost 20 weeks now, loved it, saved baby names doctors and other important numbers and appointments on here, the kick counter and other things. I get on the other day just to find everything has been wiped, from my phone and iPad. This is very frustrating, I would like this fixed, every time I get back on I have to resign in and reenter the due date every time now. So I would like my info restored or a refund of my money!!

title: Great App!!
body: Really enjoyed app, at first I was bummed about the free portion ending at 14wks, but decided to support the app developers and spend the extra few dollars. It was well worth it! This app was the most used out of about 4 pregnancy apps that I used.

title: Feel More Connected From Afar
body: My daughter and I both downloaded the app at the beginning of her pregnancy.  As Grandma to be, the app provided the wording, "Your daughter..."  She and her husband moved out-of-state in her fifth month, but because of the app, I still feel so connected to her pregnancy.

title: A+
body: Love this app! I show my little one the progress on my pregnancy and how big his sibling is getting and he gets excited! It also has a lot of useful tools and information for beginning moms or moms who are expecting for a second or third time.

title: I like this app
body: It runs smooth & the images are very sweet. It's also got a laid back approach to weight gain & feeling tired & doesn't make me feel like I'm doing something wrong. I would like to see the app acknowledge partners of all types & not just "dad" but I would recommend to anyone that was having a routine pregnancy

title: Ok until 15 weeks
body: I used another app during my first pregnancy and say to try this one out second time around. It was comparable but not that much better than the other app I used fan at 15 weeks I wasn't able to access any of the features unless I wanted to pay to upgrade. extremely disappointing especially after I started to input my pregnancy information and invested time into putting my info into this after track.

title: Good info over time
body: I love that this app takes the overwhelming amount of pregnancy related information out there and delivers it in a weekly format that is much easier to take in. Always looked forward to the "next installment".

title: Best app!!
body: I'm 35 weeks and have had this app since I first found out I was pregnant. I absolutely love it! It gives great information and I love that I can keep track of my weight, doc appts and questions for the doc. I would definitely recommend this app!!

title: Love this app!!
body: When I first found out I was pregnant I downloaded 4 apps! And this is by far the best! Best pictures, features and information by far. I'm only 10 weeks and I can't wait to buy the full version of this app. It will be worth every penny.

title: Great App
body: This app has tons of features and has been very helpful so far. I'll be purchasing the full one when we reach the 13 week mark!

title: Mom of 5 natural births! Halleluia!
body: I love your app! I wish I had this when I first started out! Schools should use this information as a class-wonderful to see God's handiwork and plan in motion! I am using it to help my expecting friends! You should include an herbal section of nutrition. Thanks again! Mac mom

title: Great App-easy to use and navigate
body: Lots of info in this app- but it's still easy to find and sort thru, something I didn't find with other apps. There's probably more info than you need or that applies to you, but seems to cover a lot o people.

title: Spectacular app! :)
body: I love this app!! I look forward to checking it every morning to see how my baby boy is progressing and what I should be doing or looking out for. It has been a great tool to help me along the way. As well as get me more and more excited each day!

title: Great application for this new mom to be
body: This app is very informative on what is going on with my body, my baby's development and what to expect each day and each week. I get to read daily advice for health tips and see the progress the baby has made. Really great app!!!!

title: Very useful!!
body: I really like seeing the new baby images each week. It gives me an idea of what my little girl looks like. The weekly information on how she's growing is also very nice. It has several useful features.  No glitches in it so far.

title: Great until you have to purchase
body: I really enjoyed this app a lot....until I got to week 15. At that point I was no longer able to use all of features within the app, even small things like info for each week. I found this very frustrating and I feel that there are other, free, apps that give you similar info and features. I wouldn't really waste my time with this one.

title: Best Pregnancy App!
body: This app is the best as far as pictures and information. The pictures look so life like. There are in app purchases though that you will have to buy to get past a certain week. I thought it was totally worth it!

title: Favorite pregnancy apps
body: When I first found out I was pregnant I downloaded 8-10 apps for pregnancy, most of them the free apps. But as my pregnancy moved along I slowly weeded them out. I'm 37 weeks pregnant now and it's the only app I continue to use. It's the best one and worth the money!

title: We love
body: This site is awesome it gives so much info but iit's awesome!!!! ONLY down fall is u can only do so much without paying which is hard when having a baby. But they really give u a lot for free. Loves it. My bf and I do. It's so cute when I'm sad we go straight to this     App it's a must have

title: Great app
body: Even though I've been pregnant before this app is very helpful and gives me so many tips I didn't know before and the pictures just makes more connected to my expected child. Still first trimester and can't wait to unlock the rest of the app when I hit 13 weeks.

title: SimplyTess
body: This app is awesome! I've recommended it to many friends. I have no issues with it and I love seeing what my baby looks like each week. Tips and fun info are great. It's really helped me involve my other two small children with the upcoming arrival of their first brother.

title: I don't waste my time but....
body: I had to write a quick review. Get this app. I found myself checking the app weekly and it gives some solid advice. It's like having a friend who already had a baby coach you through your 9 month.

title: Loved this app
body: Perfect pregnancy app! Love the weekly updates! Loved the pictures and tips!

title: This is the pregnancy app for me!
body: I love this app! It helps me remember how many weeks I'm pregnant I read all the weekly guides! There is so much to this app that's so helpful . I used it for my first and now I'm using it for my second . I tell all my pregnant friend and family about this app!‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è

title: This app is amazing!
body: I am currently 36 weeks pregnant with my first baby, this app has truly helped me stay on top of everything I needed to get done and also just telling me what changes are going on with my body. I absolutely recommend downloading it!

title: Wonderful pregnancy app!
body: This app is wonderful! It has beautiful pictures of your growing baby, you can put your own pictures also, and it has every organization tool you can need. It is also informative and helpful.

title: Thank you for being a part of this precious period!
body: The most helpful and filled with information app! Everything in one place, the best weight tracking which is very important for the baby's and mom's health. Thanks again!

title: Love it!
body: I love this app! I used it all during my first pregnancy and now I just found out I'm pregnant again and still love using this app! I love how it covers so many different topics and I can actually get a real feel for how my baby looks and is developing!

title: Awesome
body: I love this app above all others. I'm a third time mom and wish I had this with my other two. Nothing is better than seeing what my baby looks like each week. I like that I can personalize this and add notes. The tools are very helpful.

title: THE BEST (Pros/Cons)üëå
body: This app is amazing it's provides everything as to when your last cycle and etc that's the pros.üëç The cons is that in order to see the weeks of your child development it only preview 12weeks you must pay $2.99 for the full version to see the remaining images of the weeks developmentüëé

title: A must have!
body: This app is amazing!! It gives you updates day by day so you know what's going on. There are so many things within this app as well. I highly recommend getting this app especially if this is your first pregnancy

title: Great app!
body: Great images of what baby should look like every week. Great information about how baby is developing and what to expect as pregnancy progresses. Other pluses like baby name suggestions based on popular names throughout the world. The only thing missing are community boards where moms can talk to each other.

title: Best app yet
body: This is my second pregnancy, and one of a dozen apps I've tried. By far, this is the best yet. Not only can you track the baby's growth, but you can chart and follow your weight daily, if you like, make check lists, track appointments, etc!

title: Good info & Spot on
body: I love this app. It's better than any others I've tried. It provides great info, and it's been pretty much dead on with what symptoms I may experience each week.

title: Best pregnancy app out there
body: I love this app. The home page info updates often, not just weekly like some other apps, and it's both concise and informative. The kick counter, birth plan starter, and shopping/to do generators are so helpful. I only wish it's bump picture feature was weekly instead of monthly.

title: Really great!
body: I used this app throughout my entire pregnancy and loved it! It has really interesting and valuable information on it and kept me excited each day/week to learn more about my pregnancy! Would highly recommend it!

title: Not happy
body: My app just updated yesterday. :(

title: Beautiful & great articles
body: Really have gotten a lot out of the articles and love the photos more than other apps.

title: The most useful pregnancy app
body: I have many pregnancy apps, but for some reason, I check this one the most. It has everything you need to know each week during your 1st trimester. I'll be purchasing the full app for 2nd and 3rd trimester.

title: Adds easy to an expecting Mommy!
body: So educational and detailed!! I've tried a few other apps and this one is by far the best! You can see week by week how baby and Mommy change and keep track of weight and appointments!

title: Loved it!
body: I already have 2 children but they are a little older. There were several really helpful tools for weight tracking and my 7&8 year old really loved hearing the weekly updates on their new baby sister.

title: Very detailed, daily update!
body: I really enjoy this app I've only had it for about 3 to 4 weeks but I enjoy every day looking at the new update and pictures of what the baby size is, in ultrasounds and real life. Like to read the daily blogs too!

title: Great app!
body: This is my 4th pregnancy and this app is the best one I have found! I love the daily blog post, the pictures of the baby, the weekly updates on your body and the baby. It's easy to use. Didn't love the price of the full version as much, but I love this app over the completion and I've tried them all.

title: Very Helpful
body: This app was very helpful to me and helped me show my partner and my children what was going on inside me. It also helped me out too. Many times I didn't understand what was going on with me and this app explained everything.

title: Misleading... Not a free app.
body: So disappointed... Was really liking this app, but as soon as I hit my second trimester, features stopped working unless I upgraded to the pay app. By 16 weeks the app was pretty much not functional at all because every useful feature was locked without the upgrade. Would have much rather seen that it was a $4 app from the beginning and I would have been more likely to pay for it. I feel misled and will find a new app to use.

title: Enjoyed Every Week!
body: I loved this app. I would look forward to reading about each week, adding my photos, and information about my expected little one. I've enjoyed the app so much that I now follow the continuation app: Baby+.

title: Great App for twin pregnancy
body: Most of the apps that I looked over didn't have a special section for twins like this one did. The app is full of useful information. I've used it from apx 6 weeks. Now, I'm 35 weeks and will use it through delivery.

title: Pretty neat images!
body: This is my second pregnancy, but the first time using this app. It's definitely so much "cooler" than the other 2 I used previously with the pictures and images - though I do not like that you have to pay, nearly $5 to see extended videos and such.

title: This app is so helpful!
body: This is my first pregnancy and I had a lot of questions about do's and don'ts. The app was very informative about exercise, what to eat, what not to eat. It saved me from calling my doctor all the time about little things! Thanks so much!

title: Great Pregnancy App!
body: This app is easy to read, easy to navigate, and very informative. It makes the journey to labor fun, and I feel the facts and information it gives me really ups the anticipation for my baby! This is definitely one of my favorite pregnancy apps I've downloaded.

title: Wonderful App!
body: I have many pregnancy apps, but this one was by far the best one I've downloaded. It's informational and interesting, all the while showing images of your baby in utero (2d and 3d). I highly suggest downloading this app if you're expecting a child!

title: Great app!
body: Love it! I look forward to the new daily info each day, as well as the new weekly summary of the baby's development as well as my own. Love seeing ultrasound and drawn pics of a baby at each stage. Also like that I can track my weight

title: Great app, highly recommended
body: This is a great app. It is the only app that you will need through your pregnancy. The only problem I had is when I tried to use the contraction timer, the app would crash. Other than that I love this app.

title: Great!!! But...
body: I love this app. It's simply amazing if you're pregnant and tells you so much. It's the best app I could find and I absolutely love it. I only rated it four stars because it would be even better if you got all the weeks free instead of 1-14 for free but I think even I might like it enough to find it worth it.

title: Love this app
body: This app has been helpful to me since I haven't had a baby in 11 yrs. It's not like I forgot anything but reading the material everyday has made my pregnancy a lot smoother and a lot of information to pass time way. Thanks for having this free app.

title: The best!
body: I got many pregnancy apps and this one is, without a doubt the best! The graphics and images are beautiful and it is super complete. I love that you can easily create your birth plan or hospital bag list and then email it fast in a very organized way!

title: Only free for a few weeks!! Deleted!!
body: I was pleased with this app UNTIL i entered my 15th week of pregnancy! It wouldnt allow me to go any farther until I paid for the app!! What a joke! Up until this point, it gave good information about what was going on with baby and your body but I'm disappointed that now I cant use it anymore. Deleted the app. I wouldn't download it unless you wanna just go ahead and buy it!!

title: Following 1st grand babies growth
body: LOVE this app!! I'm using this app to follow my daughters pregnancy. She lives out of town and  it helps me feel involved even though I can't see her everyday. Wish there had been something like this when I was carrying her.
response: We're so glad you like the App! Thanks for the great review!

title: Better then the others
body: I plan to buy full app when I'm far enough along. Iv seen a lot of apps with my first pregnancy & now started looking around with my second pregnancy. This one is way better then free stuff. Worth the cost to extend.

title: Love it!
body: This app is so easy to use and very informative and interactive. My husband even downloaded it because he loved using it on my phone and reading the information about the baby and status of the pregnancy.

title: Best pregnancy app ever
body: Awesome app! Lets you see how baby is looking each week. Gives so much information about babies and mommy's growth. Even gives advice for dad. I am due in 2 weeks and found this app useful throughout my entire pregnancy.

title: Best app!!
body: It is amazing to have this pregnancy app as we progress through this pregnancy! The images are beautiful and realistic and the daily updates are fantastic, informative and comforting to read every day as things change. We LOVE this app!!

title: Disappointed
body: I used this app when I was pregnant with my son and loved it so of course I downloaded it again for this pregnancy only to be very disappointed that now I would have to pay $4 for it. I only use the app for 9 months and have to pay for it. That is ridiculous and I refuse to do so.  I used to use the app to show my class of 4 yr olds the different stages that the baby was at bc they are very excited about a baby growing in their teachers tummy.

title: Second pregnancy
body: I'm almost done with this second pregnancy and I use this app every day. I love it and so does my daughter she loves the pictures every week and I enjoy reading it daily. Definitely wish I had it for my first pregnancy.

title: A wonderful app that will help in many ways
body: Absolutely love this app.. It is wonderful it has taught me a lot with my first child, and excited to have this app!! Would greatly recommend this app to any new moms to be, and any moms that have kids on the way! . It's awesome!

title: Absolutely LOVE this app!
body: Its better than other "My Pregnancy" app because its not as invasive and pushy! Other apps try to scare you into thinking every hiccup is a potential disease when its really perfectly normal! Im at my 2 month mark and I will be using this app full-term :-)

title: Love it but.....
body: I bought the premium version on my phone and when I tried it on my iPad it water to charge me AGAIN!!! I have no access to the premium account on my iPad!that made me a bit upset, but other that that I like it.

title: Great App!!
body: I love this app! Being a first time mom this app has been very informative and beneficial. I have learned so much from it and it has helped me keep track of my appointments, weight, etc. I would recommend it this app to anyone expecting.

title: Totally love it!!!
body: This app has to be my favorite. It has so much information and helpful tools. It gives you weekly updates and pictures on your baby's development and daily tips... Which are so useful! Total must have...!

title: Very informative and keeps track of things
body: It's very organized and easy to use.  You can keep track of all your appointments and the stats given.  There is daily and weekly information so there is always something new to look at.

title: Great!
body: I love this app. I have two pregnancy apps and I use them both daily/weekly. I used the other one with my previous pregnancy. It works great.. However I saw this one and thought I would try it this time around. I love it. It is defiantly a keeper!

title: Ridiculous
body: I have 4 of these apps I read each week because I love reading about what my child is doing in the womb even if it is all the same I like the few words here or there that are different. I can't believe people are paying for this app when it offers nothing different then all the great free apps. Why waste your money good info but no different than all the others

title: Love it. Wish it had journal.
body: This app is great! I also have the WTE & Ovia apps. This one, by far, is my favorite! It seems to be the most useful as a whole. I do however, wish that there was a journal feature so that I could mark milestones (telling family, first kicks ect). I have kept my Ovia for this reason.

title: Great App Overall But
body: Great App Overall But The only Thing I Dislike Is That you can only see what your baby is suppose to look like after certain weeks/months. It'd Be great if it could show the whole 9 months.

title: App Review
body: I really, really love this app. I just reached week 28 and haven't found an app better than this one! It's totally worth the what, $3? to get the premium app after the first trimester. It is beautiful, easy to navigate, helpful -- I cannot say enough good things! xx

title: What a load of horse crap!!!
body: I downloaded this app for free and I was able to look ahead through every step.  Even though this is my 3rd pregnancy, it is my daughter's first time participating with preparing for her baby sister.  She loved watching how the baby grows and keeping track of my health.  Now, I have to pay 4 freaking dollars to see what goes on past a certain point that I have already passed!!! It didn't do that last week, so why now?? Greedy asshats!

title: So cute
body: This app has the cutest baby pictures!!!!!!!!! It's also not full of adds, which is refreshing for an expecting parent. My girlfriend also reads the articles, which is cool, but the cute baby pictures are where it's at

title: Great App
body: Probably my favorite pregnancy app. Concise information presented in an organized manner with all the important widgets (like kick counter, weight tracker etc). Wish it didn't cost money but worth the $4 to have through your whole pregnancy.

title: Great app
body: This is my second pregnancy and this app is great. It explains things I didn't realize the first go-around. I love the pictures that show what the fetus looks like each week! I will definitely be purchasing the full version.

title: Great App!
body: I am pregnant with our first so I am learning a lot overall. This app has been helpful for me to keep everything in one place (dr. Apts/tests) and helps me share with my hubby where we are at in the pregnancy. I will most likely download the full version!

title: Very helpful!
body: This app is very helpful especially for first pregnancies. It guides you daily, weekly and monthly so you know what to expect at each stage of your pregnancy. My favorite is the size chart which compares your baby to a fruit every week! Mine is a grape now!

title: Really helpful
body: I am 33 weeks and have used this app since about week 6.  It's really informative and interesting. I love reading about how the baby is developing every week.  My husband appreciates the partner info as well.  It's definitely worth it.

title: Great app overall!!
body: Tells me everything I need/want to know! So much that I purchased it!! Only thing I wished it had was weekly images of the baby's actual hand.(I have to keep another app for that üòí) worth the money!

title: Not a Fan of Paying for 'Free' App
body: I got this app under the impression it was free. This is not the case so be warned! I can see paying for one or two extras or no ads but when I download a free pregnancy app I should at least be able to get the week-by-week updates for free. If you want to see more than an arm or leg in the weekly pictures you also have to pay. Overall I am pretty disappointed and will be deleting this app and downloading a different one.

title: Love this app
body: I have used this app a lot since learning I was pregnant. It is very exciting to see the changes each week and the app is very easy to use. The $3.99 was nothing in relation to how much info was available to me at my finger tips.

title: best app
body: I love this app it has helped me more through out this pregnancy than anything else. I recommend this app to every pregnant woman. I would have easily paid $10 for this app and will use this for the rest of my pregnancies!

title: Love!!
body: I love this app!! I'm usually the type to find free versions of apps, but this one let me try it out, so I knew it was worth buying. My weeks starts on Thursday, so I always look forward to the news of the week! Totally worth every penny

title: Love this app
body: I downloaded this app because my daughter is having twins and it allows me to be the grandmom. My daughter has the same app she lives 870 miles away from me so this app helps me to be apart of the pregnancy even though I'm not there . I love this app

title: Helpful app
body: Love tracking the progress of my new grand baby with this app.  Wish we would have had something like this when we were starting our family

title: Informative App
body: If a women is pregnant with her first child this app is great, it gives you daily things to think about or something you should discuss with your doctor or partner. It is also helpful for women like me who have an almost teenage child and am now pregnant with my second. It's the perfect refresher.

title: Totally worth it:)
body: I so enjoy using this app, because being a first time mother, I can go look everyday to see what I need to do, what's happening with me and my body and it is just a helpful tool :) I would recommend this to anyone :)

title: Love the app!
body: I do love the app and will pay for it after the second trimester. There is a lot of information and places for me to log my info. I like the weekly updates and the daily updates with my pregnancy too :)

title: Great App
body: I really liked this app compared to the other pregnancy apps I've tried to use. It's easy to use and is informative too. I found this about halfway through my 1st preg. and was the first one I went to for my second.

title: Our little one
body: This App is awesome!  It is one stop shop!  It can hold pictures of you month by month, it has place for pictures of baby, information every step of the way!  Size charts, weigh in charts, contraction counter!  It's great!!!

title: Awesome
body: Love this app I could see all of my baby's progress and how big my belly would look like while pregnant and I could also maintain my weight to see how much I have gained....I would recommend this app to anyone who is pregnant u would love this app :-)

title: My fav!!!
body: I love the images on this app! I look forward every week to seeing how my baby transforms and everyday to the great blogs. I also can save my doctor appointments and make a baby name list. Just wish there were videos.

title: Love reading it every day!
body: Nice, easy to use , convenient app with useful information and resources. It's been the main app I use for my baby size/development info and for tracking pregnancy changes. Highly recommended!

title: Timely info and not overwhelming
body: Really liked it - didn't feel pressured to join. Appreciated that it was informative without providing an overwhelming amount of information each week.

title: Great until the update
body: I purchased the app and loved it until the update. I do not like that the weight option no longer allows digital input just whole lbs. I also don't like being prompted to sign in with social media. Please fix the scale so that it allows manual digital input and some way to permanently decline the personal media sign in.

title: One of my fav apps
body: I must say for being a first time mother I truly loved this app it has been helping me through all my pregnancy and the questions I have about what I'm feeling. Gives me a breakdown to what I might feel next which I love.

title: My favorite pregnancy app!
body: When I found out I was pregnant I downloaded every pregnancy app out there. Out of all this is my favorite! The blogs are informative, they have a partner info spot so they don't feel left out! Great daily tips! And so much more!

title: Loved this app as a grandmother
body: I used the app to track my daughter's pregnancy.  Especially loved taking monthly belly pics.  Her older children felt a part of the pregnancy by looking at the pictures of "baby sister".  Recommend highly.

title: Great app
body: I love this app. It give great detail for just about everything. The only down side is having to pay for the extra features but it is understandable. I would recommend this app to expecting mothers and partners.

title: Worth every dollar!
body: This is my first pregnancy and I have learned a ton from this app! I really appreciate the blogs and discussing things that aren't necessarily informational, but beneficial. I really enjoy the ultrasound pictures and what the baby looks like! Also, partner information was helpful as well! Worth the $4!

title: Best Pregnancy App Ever!
body: I have two and this one is by far my favorite! It's beautifully detailed but easy to maneuver. I normally won't "buy" an app but I didn't think twice about paying for this one. Try the first trimester free! It is totally worth it!

title: 1st Baby
body: This app is BY FAR the BEST one I've used

title: Best app out there!
body: Absolutely worth getting. By far the most comprehensive, informative, easy to use app I've tried. It really does have everything to keep you informed all along the way and prepares you for birth.

title: Love!
body: Love this app; used it with my first baby, and now with my second. Very informative, and the interface is user-friendly. Definitely worth paying for the full version after the trial period expires.

title: Awesome Ap
body: I love this ap! I look forward to looking at it everyday! It is so informative!! All kinds of neat things about your babies growth! Definitely worth the small charge for the full version! I recommend this to all my pregnant friends!!

title: Very helpful
body: I used this app during my whole pregnancy. I loved the daily tips and weekly pics. Very helpful! I even used the contraction tool when I went into labor. I had baby boy in April and open it occasionally to remember my pregnancy.

title: Happy to have had this!
body: The baby is here, we used this app since the day we found out about our pregnancy. The best part is the counters both are very helpful and love the way it charts for you. That was very useful to my midwife! Thanks!!!

title: Great app
body: Love the weight tracker feature on the app cause other preggo apps don't have it. Love the weekly images. And the week by week info is also a little different than from some of the other apps.

title: Pregnancy Plus App Rating
body: Love this app, very informational. And I love how I can keep track of my weight gain, doctors appts, and what I need to do and buy before my son gets here. The baby size guide is really nice and I like how the pictures week by week are in 2d, 3d, and a normal image.

title: 16 & pregnant
body: If you're pregnant you should definitely get this app it's a great app. Especially if you're pregnant at a young age or this is your first baby. At least try it out to see if you like it if you do t delete it it. I guarantee you will love this app.

title: Love this app
body: I love this app because I e been learning a lot of things during this pregnancy. Good tips, ideas, and information is provided. I like seeing the weekly pictures. Incredible! Also great to have a daily read!

title: Informative
body: I really like the app. It's quite informative and realistic. Husband and I receive good info and it's fairly easy to use. I love the kick counter feature and seeing the profession photos. Would recommend it

title: An option for "surrogate"?
body: Wish there was an option to select that I'm the surrogate, so I don't have to read "XXX, your friend is x weeks pregnant" on the home screen. Otherwise, app is great. Easy to use, good info, not too overwhelming. Just started using it, excited to learn more!

title: Love this app!
body: It's a well designed app that has beautiful images and is easy to use. The articles are informative and helps track so much information during pregnancy.
response: It‚Äôs lovely to read your positive review!

title: Awesome
body: Love it,I read it to my mom and helped her out the whole 9 months,now my baby bro is 7 almost 8 months but I had a great time with my mom,and I think that  this pregnancy has made us closer,an the app has helped us out a lot.

title: Many features unavailable in lite
body: I downloaded this app and quickly found out that the information available pertains only to the first trimester. Second and third trimesters, contraction timer, kick timer, along with numerous other "features"  are included when the user has upgraded to the paid version.

title: Pregnant
body: I am 5 months pregnant, this app has helped me with images, and what to expect. It has a check list for mom, dad, and the baby in what to bring to the hospital when it is time. I highly recommend this app to all expectant mothers.

title: Great app
body: Loved this app. Lots of useful information throughout the pregnancy.

title: Great app!!
