body: I enjoy this app because it helps me know where my baby is as far development and growth. I can check my weight gain and put notes when I see my doctor. I think it's definitely great and so worth it!!!

title: Love this!
body: I absolutely loved everything about this app. It was plenty of information without being overwhelming and helped me to keep track of multiple things at once.

title: Best app found!
body: I downloaded a few apps when I found out I was pregnant. This is the only one I kept. It has so much information! I am always excited to see what the next week has to say.

title: Awesome
body: This app is great I mean for anyone who is  pregenant and wants a really good app. This is the one for you. My fianc√© is 15 weeks and we have had nothing  wrong with this app. Very informative for first timers also. We love it. Thanks and keep up the great updates.

title: Great App
body: Great app. I did purchase the upgrade, but if you're willing to spend a couple dollars extra it's worth it. You can always find the same information and pictures online but this is condensed in one app so no need to look any further. üòÄ

title: Very nice app
body: I love the daily articles and info. I love to see the pictures of my little precious baby growing as well. Yes you have to pay to upgrade it but it's worth it. I plan on using it again for my next pregnancy

title: A Very Helpful App
body: No information overload, easy to use and good pictures. For the 1st timer like me or been there like my wife, helps us stay on track. Some conversations throw us off, it's not the App or developer's fault. Well done, thanks!

title: Displaying wrong week!
body: Awesome app. I have considered upgrading to the full version bc it has so many useful tools. But it's driving me nuts that it displays one week ahead on all my settings...even though my due date is correct. (ie. I'm due Dec 3rd, and am 10 weeks today. But everything on the app displays the 11 week updates.)

title: Best app!
body: I have 6 pregnancy apps and this one is by far my favorite! I love that it tells you something new about your baby or what you should be doing every day! It also has good pictures and factual info!

title: Love it just need one thing
body: I'm planning to use this app again for my second pregnancy but would like one thing added. A Facebook link so that I may post a once a week up date of my journey.

title: Awesome app
body: This is one of the best app I ever downloaded. I recommend this to anyone expecting. I wish I had downloaded this when I was pregnant with my first. The upgrade is also worth it, I will be using the kick count a lot:-)

title: Helpful
body: This is great, compared to all the others. It it so detailed and REALLY helped with a lot of my questions in the beginning. The purchase I do suggest! Very informative and just great all around. I love the pictures it shows.

title: Go to app!
body: Love this app! I downloaded about 5 pregnancy apps and occasionally check the others but this one has everything I need in one place and in the most organized order.

title: Disappointing
body: I find it rather humorous that the app itself is free until 15 weeks. I wouldn't mind if it were forthcoming with the price but the fact that it's "free" and then you get the oh it's 3.99 after 15 weeks is not only disappointing but it's deceitful. I really enjoyed this app and would have gladly paid for it but to con me into it is disgusting. There are better apps that are upfront about the price. Too bad, I would have recommended this app.

title: Fantastic
body: This was a wonderful app to use throughout my pregnancy to track and learn everything about baby and myself. I wish it kept tracking things after birth!

title: Informative and interesting
body: I really enjoyed this app and looked forward to the daily and weekly updates. As a first time mother of twins, I especially appreciated the twins/multiples section. Great app and would definitely recommend!

title: Helpful app
body: More informational than interactive, but a nice app to have as a reference. I wish it had a calendar integrated as one of the tabs and a food look up that was interactive-- as in where you can look up certain ingredients and get info on if its off limits or in what situation certain foods are ok etc. otherwise nice app to have.

title: Absolutely LOVE this app!
body: Of all the pregnancy apps I use this one is by FAR my favorite. I love checking every month to see what size the baby could possibly be and you can see ultrasounds of other women too! Such an amazing app!!

title: Great app!
body: I got this app when I first found out I am pregnant and I has been such a help. I love that I can how what's going on with the baby every week of my pregnancy!  The pictures of a baby development really puts it in perspective!!!

title: Love the App!
body: Great app. I love the name list. Sharing the baby's size with my youngest son (who is a big brother to be), is fun. Each week he ask how big the baby is. Great for keeping track of weight and appointments...I love that it links with my calendar.

title: Must have this app
body: As I am experiencing my first and unexpected pregnancy, this app has really helped me to know what to expect. It has helped me to know that what I am feeling is normal, which puts my mind at ease. I love the daily blurbs and weekly "what to expect" readings.

title: A good app to have :)
body: I like this app and have had it through my whole pregnancy. Though it doesn't have every answer ever it's Fun to keep track of what week you are in and get a little dab of info.

title: Loved it !! 1 glitch minor!
body: This app was amazing and worth the price - it helped me follow along on my son and daughter in love's journey with our grandson Isaiah - so helpful!! But since I was listed as a grandparent - I couldn't figure why it kept asking me to update my weight lol

title: Love it!
body: Love this app it is up to date on information. I tried the what to expect app. And found it to be a week or so behind on babies actual development. I highly recommend this one.

title: Love the App
body: I got the app when I had just found out I was pregnant! I am 13 weeks ali g and am loving it! The baby, pics and info are super easy and great. I love seeing the baby pics as my pregnancy progresses! And the useful tips for the week... Love  it ‚ù§Ô∏è

title: I love this app and recommend 100%
body: It has been 100% my companion during this journey! With good information, tips, great links, tools and tracking all you need to track during your pregnancy!

title: Best app
body: This is a great app. It helped explain a lot that was going on durning my first pregnancy. Pretty much, everything the app said it was going to happen that week, it happen... If I didn't decided 2 get an abortion which I regret deeply ;( ,I would of bought the full app... This app is great, specially for first time moms :)

title: Love!
body: I love this app. I love the time line, it helped me really understand the whole process of my pregnancy. The only thing was I hate that I have to pay extra money for so many things I can't use that's a part of this app.

title: Okay for first trimester
body: Like this app except that it only goes through the first trimester and then you have to pay to continue with it.  Other apps are just as good, go all the way through pregnancy and are truly free, or are at least up front that they charge you.  Feels like false advertising--I will not be purchasing THIS app!

title: Every new mother must have app !!
body: Loved this App!!! Extremely informative and I absolutely loved the kick counter! Gave me all the info that my doctor gave, and mostly ahead of time so it was easier to understand every stage of my pregnancy.

title: Fantastic!!
body: This app is amazing! I used it my whole pregnancy and it was really great to have. This was my first child and the tools this app provided were so helpful and easy to use. I definitely would recommend it!

title: Love this app
body: This is a great app to get to see your baby grow, there is lots of information and advice for you to read up on, I love that it tells me each week what's new with my baby. Very interesting.

title: Amazing
body: I've used this app for my first pregnancy and second. I love the information it shares and the timeline helps keep me aware of how far I am and how long I have. It also keeps my husband up to date and informed. So awesome!

title: Information is everything
body: I am in my first pregnancy and the amount of information I get from this app is greatly appreciated! Besides being an easy to use and well done app! Loving it...

title: Amazing!! Best app ever!
body: It answered all my questions including those I wasn't aware of. Whenever I had doubts or concerns, most likely someone else already had it and the answers were already in the app. Super thankful!!!!
response: Awesome review - we are glad you found the App so supportive!

title: Really liked the app but....
body: after I purchased the App i wasn't able to change my Profile picture anymore and the App stopped counting the days of my pregnancy. That's so unfortunate. I paid money for this because I really did like it a lot and then it stopped working the way it's supposed to.
response: We'd love to help! Please use the Contact us link in the App's main menu. We want to make the App a 5-star experience for you!

title: Best prego app by far!
body: I have downloaded numerous pregnancy apps and this one is BY FAR the most informative, most user friendly there is. I absolutely love it and look forward to opening it everyday to see how my pregnancy is progressing.

title: Just what I was looking for
body: This is my first pregnancy and I want nothing but the best (: like all mothers, and this allows me to see everything I need for my baby and even lets me see every step of my baby's progress!!

title: Great app
body: Since I'm expecting and found out SO early this app is wonderful. They didn't have this kind of stuff my previous pregnancy, 5 years ago. What to expect when expecting was the bible. Now this app will be my guide!

title: A very helpful app!
body: I have used this app since before I was pregnant, I am now 9 months & it has given me so much helpful info and is so fun to read along to see how your baby is growing!üëåüëåthis app is def worth paying for!

title: Awesome!
body: This app is very knowledgeable. It has a lot of different things you can do to keep track of everything about your pregnancy. I love this and would recommend it above any other pregnancy app.

title: Its very informative and complete but
body: This app is the best one I've downloaded for pregnancy, has a little of every thing and the daily info. is very useful. Also has nice pictures. But only for the first 98 dayspop. Also you can get all the info in your drs office or online for free the app is expensive for what it has to offer.

title: Great app!
body: Being able to watch how our baby is growing week by week is just amazing. The other features are great also. No issues so far! Highly recommend to new Moms!

title: My favorite app
body: Best app ever!!! Easy to use and has lots of pregnancy information. I'm a first time mom used the app daily to track my baby's growth throughout my pregnancy. Loved how the daily blog that is optional if I want to read it. Great app for pregnancy

title: Good App, Only 1 Issue
body: Love everything about this app minus one pet peeve. You select an article to read, then you have to select another button to continue reading. Idk why this aggravates me so but it does. (I selected it the 1st time, of course I want to read it!) Otherwise it's great! üòÑ

title: Not worth it
body: When I downloaded the app it was 100% free. I had access to everything then I do an update and it tells me to pay to continue using the app? No thank you I'm not paying $4 for an app I will use a couple months then never use again. Thanks to you guys charging for this app I discovered ovia pregnancy and the bump and will be giving them 5 star reviews and telling all my friends not to download this app.

title: Love it!
body: This app is amazing! Without it I wouldn't know when my baby was conceived or an estimated due date. This app helps keep track of your whole pregnancy as well. It's just a fun app to have when you are pregnant.

title: Best pregnancy app
body: I don't usually leave reviews. But this is the best pregnancy app I downloaded. It's very helpful especially since this is my first pregnancy. It tells you what your body is doing and why. Plus how the baby is growing. This app is awesome.

title: Enjoyed this app!
body: It kept me informed and up to date on all the information I needed to know during my pregnancy. It also educated me on a lot if things I was unaware of and this was my third baby. It was a very helpful app!

title: Nice app but...
body: When you choose to download the free version...it isn't free for the duration of your pregnancy. It doesn't say that when you're downloading it, it just springs it on you...there should be an alert prior to downloading. As a result of them misleading me, I'm going to look for a different app. It isn't about the cost, it's the principle.

title: In LOVE with this app !!
body: I downloaded this app & paid for it , when I was 5-6 weeks. I'm now 14 & my boyfriend and I LOVE looking at each week to see what's going on with our baby! I love checking it DAILY to see the fun/helpful tips! This is MUST HAVE app!

title: Great app
body: I really looked forward to my weekly updates and the developmental information. It was also fun for my family to follow along. I will use again in the future, I hope!

title: Best App out there
body: I wish I would have purchased earlier. The app has great illustrations, writes on each week, and tools for weight gain, appointments, and contractions. By far better then any of the free ones and worth the money!

title: Must Have this app if pregnant
body: I use it almost every day. Tracks doctor appointments, weight gain, growth and size of baby with realistic pics. Also has a baby name picker. It's very handy and it's the app I've used most this pregnancy.

title: Daily blog doesn't work
body: The app is great but when I try to read the daily blog it always says that I don't have internet connection (which I do) hope they get this fixed, it always worked fine before

title: Love It
body: I'm glad I went with this pregnancy app. It helps keep everything together in one place. I love opening up my phone everyday to new tips and pictures of what my baby looks like.

title: Really good
body: Sad to see the trail run out and I was already running a different free app before I downloaded this one so I probably won't be upgrading but I did love the app and the information! It makes you feel at ease to know the things you are experiencing are normal!!

title: I like it
body: This app is very useful and contains a lot of information for both mom and dad. It even has an organizer that contains a shopping list of things you're gonna need to prepare for the baby. Def worth it!

title: Love this app!
body: My husband and I really enjoy this app. We were hooked and bought the full version 12 weeks in! It's fun to both be connected to the pregnancy via the daily and weekly sections.

title: Great App
body: I use this app everyday to keep up with the progress of my daughter. I love to see how she is growing it makes me feel more connected with her know exactly what is going on. I recommend this app to pregnant women all over <3

title: Pregnancy app
body: This is a great app with SO many things to offer!  We are going to be first time grandparents & can't wait to check on our grand baby week by week and his/her growth!  Beautiful images & so much more!

title: Love it!
body: I love this app I'm 39 weeks and 2 days and I've used it since we found out I was pregnant it been extremely helpful and easy to use I recommend it to anyone that overly worried and loves to research everything lol

title: A must have!
body: This is wonderful! Gives you pictures of every week and tells you just about anything u need to know. This is a must for moms especially first time moms!

title: Amazing
body: Just the app I was looking for. My husband and I look at what our baby looks like every morning. Tells you size, weight, and every tiny development. Also birthing plan & shopping guide that are very neat.

title: Love this app
body: This app is great. We have one daughter and tried for 8 years to have another baby. Finally we did and we found this app. It is great.  It is very informative and gives you great feedback.

title: 25 weeks
body: I'm 25 weeks with my 3rd child and this app has helped me along in anything I needed to know right now. Side affects, size of baby, cause of random pains. Overall great app especially for a new time is mom's!

title: Weight tracker crashes app
body: Each time I open the weight tracker, the app crashes. I've put in two entries (last one yesterday), and now it doesn't work anymore. It's crashed over 8 times now, even after restart and reset of iPad.

title: Amazing app!
body: I use to just google how my baby was doing at my monthly marker but this app has made it soo much easier! It gives lots of details and informs you of everything you need to know. I love it!

title: Excellent
body: I downloaded a lot of these apps when I first found out I was pregnant & this is the only one that made it the whole 9 months! I would definitely recommend.

title: Love this app!
body: Great daily and weekly info, allows for you to put your own photos as well as seeing sonogram photos of babies the same age! Has a timeline and contraction counter too which is great! I just wish they had social options!

title: Awesome App
body: I don't normally bore myself with writing a review, but this app was worth it. It has given my wife and I great insight while we are expecting our first child. I highly recommend this app. Super helpful and easy to use!

title: Love!!
body: I absolutely love this app. It helps keep track of appointments and weight gains and tells you about your babies developments. Also allows you to upload belly pictures and time contractions. Very useful . üíú‚ô•Ô∏è

title: Great
body: Would have given it 5 stars but not crazy about the naked side view of the pregnant women. They could have at least covered her top side and bottom :/ not something I really want to see

title: Fantastic
body: I've used this app for both of my pregnancies and love it. Extremely informative, so many different topics of information, well organized, and easy to get around.

title: Good app, better if free
body: I have to say that this app is good, it keeps updating along with the pregnancy and offers articles and blogs. However, I didn't like the fact that after the first trimester you have to upgrade and pay $4 dollars for it.
response: We're happy to hear you like the App overall. The one-off payment we ask protects your privacy and ensures your app won't have lots of ads. We understand your opinion but free apps may use your data and we respect your privacy. So, after the 14th week of pregnancy, we ask for small one-off payment instead. We hope you understand.

title: Thee Best
body: Having all of this information at my fingertips is the best thing a mom can have. This app helped me during my pregnancy! All the questions I had answered. All of my appointments were kept.
response: We're glad to hear you are enjoying the App.

title: My favorite so far
body: I have four other pregnancy apps and I like this one the best. I do wish you could add pictures, but the data and the checklists are the best. I also would like to add symptoms, but overall it's a well thought out, informative tool

title: Best app for pregnancy!
body: One of the best apps I have ever seen! Def worth it, and its nice to have the 1st Trimester free and then if you don't like it you don't have to buy the next 2, and if you did then you can! Love it! And great pictures of baby growing!!

title: Great app to keep track of pregnancy
body: I got this app as soon as I realized I was expecting and it has been great. Everyday it gives me great info, not only on baby's progress but also on what is happening with me.

title: Lots of great information
body: Very impressed. I've really enjoyed using it to track my pregnancy. Love the week by week description and picture. I'd say its worth buying the full version. Well worth $3.

title: Best pregnancy app
body: Obvious I downloaded every app about pregnancy when I found out! I played with each one, then deleted all the rest n just kept this one it covers everything!

title: Not truly a free app
body: The content in the app is great. The complaint I have is that it's only free up through the first trimester. To me, that's false advertising...if it's a free app, I shouldn't have to pay to access the whole thing.  Disappointing, I might be shopping for a new "truly free" app now.

title: Great App!!!
body: I really like this app. I can view my baby development, keep notes on what to ask my doctor, all in one. I have tried several other apps and this is by far my favorite.

title: Good but... a few glitches...
body: Love this app but there are a few glitches. It says I'm 14 weeks along EVERY WEEK. Even though I'm now 22 weeks, it still has me stuck at 14 no matter how many times I erase and re-load the app.  So I can't get the most current info. Very disappointing. Other than that, the app is great!

title: The best pregnancy app!
body: This app is so helpful especially In Times when i feel very anxious about my pregnancy because it gives related And very timely information everyday! Thank you

title: Used to be 4-5 stars
body: Not sure if things changed during the last update but I'm 15 weeks today and I'm not allowed to read any 15 week information unless I upgrade! I can only look at my past weeks which is useless and it used to not be like this. Why use this app if I can only look backwards at my pregnancy?
response: We do ask for a small one-off payment once you get through the first trimester, as we don't want to fill your App with lots of advertising. When advertising is involved, YOU, the user, are the product. If other Apps are FREE, it means in some way they use your data. We are not interested in your data and always respect your privacy.

title: Great App!
body: This is a great app! Very informative information; however, there are several words misspelled. I guess as a teacher, that is something I see and critique. Overall, this app is awesome! I am 13 weeks/5 days today. I will be purchasing the "upgrade" soon! Awesome app!

title: Great app
body: I am 10 weeks into my first pregnancy and have enjoyed reading the daily updates this provides. The graphics are very good and I have found the content informative.

title: Only good for your 1st Trimestee
body: If you want access to the things I wanted (what to pack, kick counter, labor information, contraction keeper, information in last trimester) this app will be no good for you...don't waste your time. You will have to upgrade to the full version which is unfortunate & not communicated well in the description.

title: Best baby app!
body: I have about 10 pregnancy and baby apps and this app is by far the best!! They have new info everyday not just every week. I highly recommend this app, and purchasing it! üòÉ

title: Love this app
body: Is very helpful! Gives you all the info you need to know about your unborn child :) the size and weight of the baby, tips, you can even search and save names :) it's awesome!!!

title: Grandma to be,
body: I love being able to follow the pictures and watch the baby grow. I think the articles and information is very helpful as well.

title: Love it
body: This app is by far my favorite pregnancy app out there. The week by week images of the growing baby are absolutely beautiful and the daily information is quite helpful.

title: Worth every penny!
body: This app was so helpful and the layout was perfect. I tried many other apps and this was by far my favorite and had the most information and extras!

title: Awesome !!!
body: I love this app!! I've had it my whole pregnancy and I've done the update multiple time and it hasn't once crashed i highly recommend it. Of the 3-4 I've tried this is the best one....

title: LOVE!!
body: My boyfriend and I used this app through out the entire pregnancy so far, I am 37 weeks now and we absolutely love it, paying for the upgrade is definitely worth it also!!

title: Great!!!
body: Very nice to be able to read week by week baby's dvlpmt. Loads of information, already known or not, they're easily available with this app. I used it everyday during my twin pregnancy.

title: Liked before update
body: I really liked the app before the update. I don't like the sign in page requesting social media. If I decline, I don't want to decline with every sign in.

title: Perfect App for Pregnant Women
body: Almost daily, I click on this app to learn more information about my pregnancy.  Best app for keeping track of everything going on with your body and your baby.

title: Perfect app for the new mom!!
body: Perfect app if your a first time mother. I love all the features!! I even found my babies names because they have so many to choose from!! Everything in this app is perfect!!

title: Don't bother
body: I got this app for the beautiful pictures of the baby I could show my 3 year old.  But most everything else in the app requires buying it.  Plus I can't show my son any pictures after 1st trimester, when it needs to start becoming more real to him.  I use a different app for names and birth plan as it's more extensive (and actually free).

title: Excellent app
body: Very accurate info. The pictures of the growing baby is the only thing make feel better when I have the morning sicknesd.

title: New Mom
body: Great and reliable app! Pregnant with our first child and this app has been a complete life saver. I'm able track my weight, prepare my hospital bags, enjoy the beautiful imagery and so much more. I recommend it.

title: Happy Mom To Be
body: I Love This App Been Using It Since The Beginning Of My Pregnancy. I Happily Paid The 3.99 To Unlock The Rest Of The App . It Gives You The Most Information About Your Pregnancy And I Just Think The App Is Really Neat Worth Downloading and Paying For!

title: Great for Kids too
body: My daughters and niece loved be the beautiful pictures and the images help them keep up with the baby's progress. We all enjoy the app overall.

title: Love/hate
body: I bought the full version expecting it to be super awesome. You don't get much more than when you get the free app. I also think that if your having a csection it should let you put in that date
response: We appreciate your thoughtful feedback and will share it with our development team.

title: Good but a couple of things
body: Overall I am really happy with this ap.  My only problem is that I had trouble logging a doctor appointment on it.  That isn't a really big deal though, since I just use the calendar ap for that anyway.

title: Superb App
body: I have a 6 year old that is always eager to know how her baby brother is doing in mommy's belly & this app helps me show her what he looks like & how big he is each wk & month. Also has great pointers for moms & the family.

title: Decent
body: This app is a little more 'medical' than I would like... Since I have a midwife and am having a homebirth. But, I appreciated all the additives in this one app I stead of having to have 5 apps to get everything it offers.. So I can overlook the things not necessary to me

title: Definitely the best!
body: I've tried lots of pregnancy apps trying to find the best one and this is it!!

title: Love this app!
body: Purchased this app at the beginning of my pregnancy and I absolutely love it! It kept me up do date on what's going on with my baby and my body and I love how it has a section for the partner as well.

title: Proud Parent
body: I love this app. It helped me throughout my pregnancy. Questions were answered that I've had concerns on. It broke every trimester out daily and weekly. I would recommend this app to any woman thats expected. Thanks alot!!

title: Love it!
body: This is one my favorite pregnancy application. I can only pick few that I check daily and this one is one of them. Love the information provided, sources and photo/graphic of a baby.

title: Love all the information provided on this app
body: Very good app. You can keep up with weight gain l, baby kicks. And specially it tells you what is happening with your baby and body every week.

title: App
body: We loved this app! Every week we would sit and look at all the changes that had occurred! Very pleased with all the info and pictures of scans and baby!
response: Thanks for the lovely review!

title: Kelly
body: I really enjoy using this app, it has kept track of my pregnancy. I have marked what i have gotten and what i need for the baby on the same app doctors appointment my weight really useful i love it .

title: Love It
body: Love this app, it was very helpful throughout the pregnancy specially for a first time mom. It has tons of info plus sonogram pictures to help you see what the baby should look like every week.

title: Super helpful best app
body: It's easy to use and has tons of information. Couldn't imagine not having it though my pregnancy. Love the daily info and the weekly also.

title: Love this app!
body: I have multiple pregnancy apps but this is definitely my favorite, and definitely worth getting the plus! I use it all the time (: makes me so excited!

title: New mommy to be
body: I enjoy this app very much. Of course I had to pay the $3.99 (one time payment) to be able to get the full version of this app. But, well worth it. Helps first time moms to be.

title: Good buy
body: This is my first pregnancy and I have several apps downloaded on my phone. This is the only one I have paid for and it's also the one I use the most.

title: Awesome
body: I'm a first time mom and it literally answer questions I have everyday, and keeps me up to date and even more excited about my pregnancy. I've learned so much from this app!

title: So excited
body: This is a wonderful app. It keeps you current with what's happen. It answers all of the questions you may have. A wealth of information.

title: love this app!
body: I checked this app almost every day in my pregnancy and learned so much.  It's really easy to use and let's you easily keep track of how your baby is growing and developing!

title: Favorite Pregnancy App
body: This is my favorite pregnancy app. The daily articles are well-timed and also well-documented in medical literature. I know I can trust the content of this app. I also love the weekly updates with partner info!

title: Great app
body: I love this app! I looked forward to reading the new information every morning when I woke up and it was so fun to see the pictures change as my pregnancy progressed!

title: It's great
body: This is my 4th baby but it's been 14yrs since my last, so I'm starting all over in this generation of technology. I think so far it's great but I did see that you Hv to start paying in your 2nd trimester so that's a bummer! I also wish it gave you a lil more info like some other apps. Overall it's ok

title: Great app
body: This is a GREAT app! I recommend it to every women that pregnant because it tells you everything you need to know & more. I wish I had this app 8yrs ago when I was pregnant with my son. Enjoy :) I know I am

title: Love This App
body: This app is easy to navigate and has all the information and tools you need throughout your pregnancy and to prepare you for the arrival of your baby. I highly recommend it!

title: So helpful!
body: Great week by week and day by day. Love the pictures and facts. I love that I have such a great idea of what is going on with my baby. The timeline and articles really help me know more, since this is my first.

title: Meh.
body: There are better free apps out there.  It seems pretty decent and you get used to using it then it blocks everything unless you pay the full price after you've progressed far enough in your pregnancy.  But they don't have anything more special or worth the money above other free apps.  So it was just a waste of space for me.

title: The best
body: I tried about 4 other pregnancy apps for the first couple months, this one was the only one still standing by the beginning of my 2nd trimester. It truly is the best pregnancy app out there!

title: Pregnancy +
body: Love the app.  Always has good tips for expecting moms.  Especially love the weight gain tracker to see my results as my pregnancy progresses ((:  thank you for making my first pregnancy a good experience with the help of your app.

title: Customer service rep
body: This app has everything . This is my first pregnancy and this app has been super helpful . It has many features . I recommend it to all mothers and mothers-to-be . :)

title: The best app
body: The best app I could ever use , besides helping me keep on track with my weigh and it has a lot of good information how to do things it has a lot of good things I will deffenaly use it againg if I ever get pregnant againg !

title: Love it
body: I love this app. Used it for both pregnancies and the contraction tracker totally easy to use and made thing so easy when it was time! I have suggested it friends and they love it too!

title: Amazing!
body: I used this app the track my sisters pregnancy and I tried others but this was by far the most accurate one to use. I highly recommend it!!

title: Baby got Apps
body: This is a very useful app. I downloaded several but this is the only one I use. It's tracks your pregnancy day to day, and makes it feel very personal. Download now, and congrats mommies!

title: Great
body: It's a great app with lots of good tips and settings to count kicks add track your weight etc. the only downside is that you have to pay in order to get the extras and after the 1st trimester

title: I use this app daily for updates on my pregnancy
body: I love this app. I check it daily to get updates on my pregnancy. It is informative and fun. I also enjoy the photos and videos.

title: So useful!!
body: This app has been so useful to me with my first pregnancy. I love the daily blog and little tips it gives. It also keeps me organized and excited for my little one! Thanks!

title: Could'to live without this app!!!!
body: With my first two children I had to read books, this app was my right hand throughout my current pregnancy!!!!

title: Has everything !
body: This is my second pregnancy and this is an Excellent app. Much better than my beloved My Pregnancy. Very complete. Has Medical info, fun facts, even top names divides by origin, birth plan, contraction count... Everything

title: Useful info, awful articles
body: The weekly info is great and very helpful. It's nice being able to see images and get an idea of what is going on with baby every week. The articles from the blog are awful though. They are very patronizing and often insulting to women.

title: Such a great app for FTM
body: Everyday this app touched on every topic possible I was either curious about and so much more information that allowed me to stay on top of everything I needed to be doing and prepared for

title: Great app!
body: I used this app with my first pregnancy and now with my second. There is always great information and like to read the day by day or week by week info.
response: We are glad you like the App - thanks for the great review!

title: Very helpful
body: I look forward to reading the daily pointers, which are well thought out and timed just right with what I'm going through and wondering about.

title: Great App!!!
body: My husband and I both love this app!!  It has great daily tips and great descriptions of the baby's weekly growth!!  We love reading all the daily notes and the pictures are so detailed!

title: Perfect
body: I love it. I downloaded three pregnancy apps and this is the one I actually use. The dad has it on his phone too and keeps me and friends up to date with help from this app.

title: Very Informational!!
body: This app is amazing! It contains so much information from the beginning to the end of your pregnancy! I recommend this to anyone, even expecting fathers. Definitely worth the money.

title: Eatitgonzales
body: This app is great I go on it everyday. It shows me exactly how many months and days I am. And there's always a daily blog that I can check out. This whole app is very informative.

title: Best Baby App!
body: Easy to navigate, pictures are awesome, & daily tips help so much! This will be the only pregnancy app you'll need. Perfect in every aspect. Loved the whole set up, it helped me get prepared before my 1st child was born. ^.^

title: Favorite Pregnancy App
body: I love the weekly updates, the countdown, the size comparison, daily blog, and especially all the pictures! I have several pregnancy apps and this is by far my favorite one!

title: Love this app
body: I love this app! I'm 24 weeks pregnant and I have everyone following my posts on facebook. I use this app to get my weekly update and tell me what fruit/veg size my baby is. It's lots of fun! And the facts are great!!

title: Pay twice?!
body: Would give 5 stars if I didn't have to pay $3.99 TWICE to have on both my iPad and phone. I already paid for it on my iPad, when I logged back in with my phone there's absolutely no reason I should have to pay to upgrade again.

title: My kids liked this app.
body: They loved checking in each week to see what fruit the baby was now the size of.
response: Glad you like the App! Thanks for the review!

title: Very helpful =]
body: I was very satisfied with all the info/pictures/tips this app gives you! Really helps keep you & your baby on track/safe during your pregnancy =] very cool & I loved it!

title: Great App!!
body: I love this app. It helps me with my pregnancy step by step. I am having my third child but since my kids are all 7 years apart it helps me remember what my body is going through.

title: Love it, a must have for every pregnancy
body: Love this app.. Easy to use and highly educational. I love reading about what changes are going on in my body and with my baby, week by week.

title: Love it
body: Love it very helpful app that looks simple and clean with only the info you really need and very user friendly i downloaded five apps and this is the only one i go back to daily

title: Great App!
body: This App has everything. Very informative and user friendly. The graphics and pictures are pretty as well. Highly recommend it!

title: Great Pregnancy App
body: Tells you week by week your development of your baby and changes that your body is growing through. It has other great features as well . Check it out and download it!

title: Informative!!!
body: This app is so clear in its way of delivering information and recording your update. It's easy to navigate through and wonderful to use!

title: Great App
body: Best app i ever came upon on, it's worth the upgrade after 15 weeks, always informative and keeps up with all the information you have put in. üëèüèΩ

title: Occasionally sexist. Often out of date. You can do better.
body: While I'm worried about a healthy baby my husband will be worried about the finances? Really? Gender stereotypes at their worst. This app relies on old information that is out of touch and in some cases inaccurate. Any app will track your pregnancy and tell you a fruit size. Spend your $$ elsewhere.

title: Love this app
body: I've used this app for both of my pregnancy. I love all the daily tips and info and to see what baby would look like inside the womb. App is very easy to use.

title: Useful app.

title: Incredible App for pregnancy!

title: App is great, but no backup
body: I really like this app for tracking my pregnancy, especially weight and stats at each OB appt. BUT, there is no backup for the info on here. It does not backup to your computer or iCloud. So if your phone has to be restored for any reason, you will lose all your info entered in this app. I sent the help desk an email and they confirmed this. Buyer beware!

title: Wonderful! ‚ù§Ô∏è
body: I tried almost all of them and this is the only one is completely full of everything u can need ‚ù§Ô∏è

title: Update glitches
body: I loved this app enough to purchase it, but the new review keeps deleting all of my information! The new update looks nice, but please fix this glitch. I do not want to enter my information every time I open the app. Plus, all of data I entered in the first 5 months is gone now. Good thing I kept a written record in a journal. I would have been seriously disappointed.

title: This is a Lite version.
body: No where did I read in the app ad that this was a lite version. At 15 weeks into the pregnancy you either pay up or lose some of the abilities you had with the app. I wish they were upfront with that in their app ad.

title: üëå Best Choice!

title: Helpful while it lasts.

You have to pay for the rest. While I understand that good things in life can't always be free, this app is just not worth the money. Ovia and Glow are much better.

title: Suggestions

response: The one-off payment we ask protects your privacy and ensures your app won't have lots of ads. We understand your opinion but free apps may use your data and we respect your privacy. So, after the 14th week of pregnancy, we ask for small one-off payment instead. We hope you understand.

title: Good info and images, just needs some tweaks
body: Overall, this was a great purchase--This was one of the only pregnancy apps I could find that didn't talk down to me (What to Expect is awful, I deleted it after a few days--how insulting). The weekly summaries are great and helpful, and the images are beautiful. I just wish they'd show full-length images for each week, as some are a close-up of the face...I want to see the whole baby, not just the face! I also feel like there is way too much twin information...it should only pop up if the user selects multiples. You're reading about changes to expect in your body and then they always throw in a "if you're having multiples" tidbit. This is in addition to the separate multiples section! Just seems unnecessary since twins are not the norm.

title: Great pictures and baby info, advice is lacking
body: I‚Äôm a mom of 5, expecting number 6, and a past childbirth instructor and doula. I honestly only downloaded this app to show my kids the baby‚Äôs development, and for that purpose, it‚Äôs fabulous! However, all of the articles and advice are either vague, not helpful (particularly for a veteran parent), or contain biased or incorrect information. What concerns me the most is the nutrition information. Yes, fruits and veggies are vital to a healthy pregnancy, but the push to avoid too many calories and eat lean meats is troubling. In order to increase blood volume, pregnant women require adequate protein‚Äî 90-100 grams a day and adding more when they‚Äôre active‚Äî and 2600 calories a day, adding more to make up for that burned in exercise/activity. Blood volume increase both helps to prevent preeclampsia and other pregnancy complications.
response: We appreciate your thoughtful feedback and will share it with our development team. Thanks to comments from customers like you we can continue to improve our App.

My 50 year old mother is not planning on getting pregnant and using the app.

body: Love how this app says to download for FREE access but, what they fail to mention is you actually have to PAY for that access. title: Good fun app
body: I paid for the app from the get go. I like everything it has to offer. It could use a public forum to chat with moms/dads/parents like BBC or something like that- it‚Äôs always nice to have someone to talk to that is on the same timeline as you in pregnancy. BBC people have gotten very rude over the years so I think that a forum in this app could help people who just want advice or someone to share the journey with. I like that there is so much information on it about things I am going through right when I open the app. I get to use the pictures to show my other kids what little sis/bro looks like and they love it too!

title: Doesn't retain my bumpies
body: After deleting the app I re downloaded and logged in with my username password. Ideally it should store my bumpies. It does not.

title: Devastated
body: I was happy with it for my first 7 months of pregnancy until my iPhone needed updating. For some reason the app would not update, therefore I deleted it from my phone( not my cloud) and re-downloaded it back to my phone. Upon doing this, the app did not recognize my email address once I tried logging on nor would it allow me to reset my password. Remember, I've had it 7 months and used it daily with auto log in so I had trouble remembering my password. Well, it never recognized my email address so I created a new account, which only allowed me to view the pre- inserted baby photos until the 15 week mark. I had purchased this app for $3.99, 7 months ago and have used it daily. All of my info was lost because it did not remember my account.My weekly pregnancy photos that I uploaded, my completed birthing plan, notes, doctor visit info, important and exciting info that I've gathered for all of my pregnancy to date. I am devastated. I would not recommend this app as whatever glitch was in their system on this day cost me valuable info, not to mention my $3.99. And I do not have long to go.

title: Cost Money
body: The app will download for free and will give you access to everything for free UNTIL you get to 15 weeks. After that, you have to pay to read or see anything in the app.

title: Good
body: I like this app I love the pictures of the baby and the information is great. I don't like that the belly pictures are of a naked body... I don't know maybe it is just me but I don't really feel comfortable showing people what the baby looks like in the belly because they have to look at a naked butt.  Ha ha sorry I just don't want to make friends/family/coworkers feel uncomfortable... So I end up using my other app that just shows the belly.

title: Great app!
body: This app was great, especially for first time pregnancy. The info always correlated w info that was read in pregnancy book/ what the md told us. Was useful for far away family- you can just email them pages of what is going on.

title: Perfect app for me
body: I looked at other apps but this is the only one that has all the information I need, with images, weekly info, and more.The navigation is easy and pleasing to the eye and it is an app I can stay interested in for  a good amount of time.I am currently at my 6th week of pregnancy and this app has been very fun to have to learn about and keep track with my pregnancy.I recommend this app to all pregnant women.Oh, and spending just $2.99 is really worth the extra stuff your get.I love it!

title: Loveit
body: First pregnancy and the apt helps out! A lot ifno and important things that you might forget to ask the md.

title: Great app
body: I have 5 different apps but I use this one the most...you will love reading about your baby daily....37 weeks and still reading about my baby on this app :-)

title: Pregnancy+
body: I'm so happy I have this app I can see my baby for I go to the doctor

title: Hidden payment blocks app at week 14
body: The app was good up until week 14. At that point, if you want current info, you have to pay. I understand this is the chosen business model. Bait for the first trimester and then: Surprise! You can't use it anymore. Fine, but like others said, be upfront about it. Respect your users. Don't try to trick them. It's not that premium content is paid at that point. Your daily status and everything is locked. Not a fan of this approach and will delete this one and use one of the other free ones despite the hassle. Not a happy customer.
response: Thanks to feedback from customers like you, we now offer free access to the blogs and baby daily and weekly articles. We now only charge for the additional tools, such as the Contraction Timer, Kick Counter, etc. We hope you will consider trying the App again.
